RelatedUrls.Description: NLDAS-2 Noah Monthly Climatology 0.125-degree Soil Moisture Content (0-10 cm) [kg m-2] January (1980 - 2019)
Access the dataset landing page from the GES DISC website.
Use the Earthdata Search Client (EDSC) to find and retrieve data sets across multiple data centers.
The GES-DISC Interactive Online Visualization ANd aNalysis Interface (Giovanni) is a web-based tool that allows users to interactively visualize and analyze data.
The GrADS Data Server (GDS) is another form of OPeNDAP that provides subsetting and some analysis services across the Internet.
How to read and plot the data.

Abstract:
This monthly climatology data set contains fifty-two fields simulated from the Noah land-surface model (LSM) for Phase 2 of the North American Land Data Assimilation System (NLDAS-2).  The data are in 1/8th degree grid spacing. The temporal resolution is monthly, ranging from January to December. The file format is netCDF. 

The NLDAS-2 monthly climatology data are the forty-year average (1980 - 2019) of the NLDAS-2 monthly data. Details about the NLDAS-2 configuration of the Noah LSM can be found in Xia et al. (2012).
